item.title: Looking for someone to make AI videos - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

Do you love making AI videos and learning about the latest AI video technology?

You've come to the right place.

I run a niche YouTube channel and we’re looking for someone who can help make Shorts for our channel.

I'm looking for someone who has experience creating high-quality AI videos and is in the cutting edge of the latest AI.  

This would consist of:

1. Thinking of catchy/viral video concepts for the channel niche.
2. Using creative ways to make content, such as using AI video generation, finding interesting clips to use, making impressive illustrations, etc.
3. Editing the video.

The videos need to be at most 60 seconds each.

We’re looking for someone to work with long term on this so if you’re interested let me know and I’ll send you some samples of the types of videos we’re looking for and you can let me know if you can do it.

Also, if you’ve ever worked on any YouTube Shorts, Tiktok, or Instagram Stories, please attach samples of your work.

I look forward to hopefully working with you!

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 30, 2024 05:04 UTC
Category: AI Image Generation & Editing
Skills:AI-Generated Art, Video Editing
Skills: AI-Generated Art, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor with Quran Recitation Editing Experience Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor who is proficient in editing quran recitation videos to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience editing Quran recitation videos and can deliver high-quality content with a fast turnaround.

Responsibilities:

- Edit Quran recitation videos to create calming and visually appealing content.

- Deliver 5 edited videos per week.

- Implement creative ideas to enhance the viewer's experience.

- Ability to work efficiently and meet tight deadlines.

(Optional) Experience in creating animations.

Sample Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EI3OlLkHZOg&ab_channel=ZikrullahTV

This is a long-term position with the potential for more projects in the future. Please submit your resume, a cover letter, and a link to your portfolio. In your cover letter, briefly describe your experience with Quran recitation videos and how you can contribute to our project.



Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 04:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: UGC Video Needed for a 40+ Neuropathy Product - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for 2 UGC creators to help us film 1-3 minute videos that will be used for Facebook ads to promote our neuropathy quiz funnel.

We only need you to film the video, then we will handle all of the editing.

Here is the link to our funnel so you can get a better idea about the offer and what the product's angle is: https://news.pulsepointers.com/nerve-savior

Here are a few UGC video examples of the style/concept that we're likely looking for:

- https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BoYqEtyO2u8q1YCUp30gwdb8-BeO9zOn/view?usp=sharing

- https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mwc5B2mPuArNyg9B7CQdiI8TDCgnzX5f/view?usp=sharing

- https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qooSytST2RGqN_Fq4uVfhOg2YI_b7Isb/view?usp=sharing

- https://drive.google.com/file/d/1vmzYwXPEARSsLfthF4LmwEaB7pB2UfRp/view?usp=sharing

If you have done anything like the following examples in the past, please attach them to your application!

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 30, 2024 04:46 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:UGC, Testimonial Video, Product Review
Skills: UGC, Testimonial Video, Product Review
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: **NEEDED** EXPERT TEAM of Video Editors BODYCAM NICHE YOUTUBE CHANNEL**** - Upwork
item.description:
**NEEDED** EXPERT TEAM of Video Editors BODYCAM NICHE YOUTUBE CHANNEL****
SEEKING: Highly motivated and talented TEAM of editors with great integrity and excellent attention to detail and able to meet deadlines REGULARLY!  We are looking for a team of top of the line EXPERTS AND EXPERIENCED professionals to join our team!
Our ideal team is experienced, communicates clearly in English, able to source extra footage to make our video edits of the HIGHEST and very BEST quality and engagement to meet the needs of our subscribers! Understands what holds retention and gains subscribers IN THIS NICHE! We WILL NOT hire anyone without proven experience on YouTube in the niche of BODYCAM, INTERROGATION.

Inquire about pricing per video edit, and possible bonus opportunities for the right candidates! And, we have plenty of regular work to keep you busy as long as our quality is the highest every time!

MAKE SURE you send examples of what you have edited in this niche or we will not respond!

YOU MUST have video samples from your most successful projects in OUR NICHE, we would like to see them!
This is an excellent opportunity for the right team!!

Style Examples:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Be6imUPHYeI
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fPCdWSKGOnc



Budget: $120
Posted On: June 30, 2024 04:40 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply
